Q_DESC:
Kumar wants to play a game. He has a positive integer N. Initially, he chooses an integer x such that 0=x=N. Then, he plays N rounds numbered from 1 to N. In round number i, he has to add or subtract i from the current value of his number x. If the new value of x remains non-negative and =N, then he wins this round. Otherwise, he loses and the game ends.

Kumar wants to win the maximum number of rounds. Help him.

Input format:

The first line of the input will contain an integer T, denoting the number of test cases. Each of the next T lines will contain an integer N.

Output format:

For each test case, print two lines. On the first line, print the maximum number of rounds that Kumar can win and the number x. On the second line, print a string of characters + or -, which describe Kumar strategy (adding or subtracting i in the respective rounds).

If there are multiple solutions, print any of them.

Constraints:            

1=T=500
1=N=105
the sum of all N in each input file doesnt exceed 4105
N  7 in test data
